title: 820 - 00840 - a not charging (?) after liquid damage
message:
Hi

Some liquid damage to the board, cleaned up, new battery, new 821-00614-a flex cable.
Unit asks to be plugged in, when plugged in shows its charging but never goes beyond that.
Any pointers?

Thank you in advance

title: 820 - 00840 - a not charging (?) after liquid damage
message:
So you can boot into OSX with charger connected?
Do you get amber light on Magsafe?
Describe liquid affected areas...

title: 820 - 00840 - a not charging (?) after liquid damage
message:
no boot - with charger I can only get the battery icon in the middle of the screen, without the charger I get the icon asking to plug it in

I have this usb c charger - idk if there is any led indicator on it

Liquid damage around U7220, q8030, c8192, c8192 and L7030, not much - little battery board was affected the most

title: 820 - 00840 - a not charging (?) after liquid damage
message:
Battery must be changed, if its circuitry has been affected by liquid.
But you should get the board working on charger only, without issue.

Check R7071 and post SMC_BC_ACOK.

title: 820 - 00840 - a not charging (?) after liquid damage
message:
Hi

R7071 is fine
SMC_BC_ACOK is 3.37v

I have a new battery
I get fan spin and with battery connected or disconnected it shows charging on the screen - I guess thats not right

title: 820 - 00840 - a not charging (?) after liquid damage
message:
You should reball SMC.
Also check for other corroded components and/or traces.
